DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine whether body fat distribution changes that occur with weight gain in women recovering from anorexia nervosa are transient or persistent, and if they are associated with other features of Metabolic Syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Does Metabolic Syndrome Exist in Anorexia Nervosa?
